properties.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity/Southern El Paso County/Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 8:31PM MST until February 7 at 3:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Accumulations of one to four inches.

* WHERE...Southern El Paso County, including Colorado Springs.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Narrow bands of intense snowfall may
cause rapidly deteriorating travel conditions. Snowpacked and
icy roads will be possible. Locally higher snowfall amounts
will be possible if these snow bands remain anchored over the
same location.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MST FRIDAY
